page.title: 19FARMS.
page.content: {GOOSELEYS FARM}(719367) is a family run farm.Acreage:8 Crops:Hay.Livestock 10 Friesian Cattle. {MEEKINGS FARM}(719364) is a family run farm. Acreage 90,Crops: Wheat,Barley and peas.No livestock or employees. { {LE HURST FARM}(719362) is a family run farm employing 1 man.Acreage:110 Crops:Wheat, barley and rape.Livestock 90 Pigs. {HOBTOES FARM}(698352) is farmed by a Stambourne family.Acreage:50. Crops: Wheat,barley and rape. No livestock. { {THURSTONS FARM}(711364) a family run farm employing l man.Acreage:160 Crops Wheat,barley and beans.Livestock:3 cows,33 bullocks.1973 saw the end of the use of traction engines on the farm,the two engines and implements are still there today in 1985.
